Dear Sheffield City Council,
It was noted in parliament that social services continently lie or mislead both professionals and the courts to make their case stronger against a parent or parents and / or cover up their failures.
1. Does Sheffield city Council consider this illegal?  if so what is the law(s) broken?
2. To support their lies and to follow a narrative,  some  professionals or social services departments withhold MINUTES of Child protection meetings or core group meetings to help them perpetrate their lies
3.a In past 5 years how many families have you sent MINUTES of CP or core group meetings within 10 to 15 working days. Of these how many are White,  Black and Asian?
3b. How many have you witheld the minutes from and for what reason?
3c. Of these how many victims of DV have you witheld the minutes of the meeting from and why? Of those how many are white, black and Asian
3d. Of these how many perpetrator have you given minutes of the CP meeting and how many have you witheld it from? Of these how many are white, black and Asian?
4.  It has been noted in parliament of the scandals (Baby P, Savile, Holly Grieg case, politicians and the like) that there has been a cover up by authorities in child abuse and that the child protection system needs urgent overhauling. Parents have complained that they have reported suspected abuse have been punished for reporting abuse have their children taken away from them by social services and passed back to the abuser. Children have also been punished for reporting abuse.
4a. How many families in Sheffield have been on Child protection since 5 years?
4b. Of these how many are White, black,  Asian?
4c Of those how many are victims of DV
4d Of these how many has Sheffield city's Council Social services gone to court and removed children from care of the victim and handed over to the abuser or to Foster carer? Of those handed over to the abuser/ perpetrator How many are whites, black Asian. Of those handed over to Foster carers how many are white, black and Asian
5. What is the budget for Sheffield social services for last 5 years
6. What are they generally uses for? Please be specific
7. When there are concerns of Mental health issues and its possible impact of children what does Sheffield social services do? Do they refer the person to Mental health for an assessment or not.
8. How many referrals has been made to Adult Social services and how many to Mental health Team due to concerns of mental health
8b. How many people have you referred for a Mental health assessment in past 5 years due to concerns of mental health?
8c Of these how many are white, black,  Asian
8d. Of those where there are concerns about their mental health, how many have you referred for psychology assessment?
8e. Have you ever refused to  refer someone to mental health assessment where there are concerns from Police or Perpetrator or other professionals? If yes how many times and of these how many are white, black and Asian?
8f.How many have you referred for psychiatric assessment? Of these how many are white, black and asian
8g how many have you REFUSED to refer for any of above assessment Because its top expensive?
9. How do you request information from other Government institutions or social services or organisations for child protection investigations?
10. Do you also send Social workers and Support workers to Scotland and Other Counties in England to seek information in person in addition to requesting copies?
10b.  If no why and if yes how many social workers and how many support workers have you sent in last 5 years to Scotland,  Other councils in England.
10c. Do you send both support worker and social Workers? If no why and If yes how many have you sent to Scotland and other local authorities to get information for CP investigations in last 5years?
11. How much is your budget for social workers and support workers to travel to get information or investigations for CP in last 5 years? Break down year by year
11b. Of these how much was spent on Hotel, feeding,  Train, Air and road travel,
12. Would the Council normally send social workers and support workers to Scotland and Other local authorities in England to seek information or as part of ongoing investigation into Child protection? If yes is that in addition to requesting information? What is rationale for sending Support workers and social workers to Scotland and local authorities within England
Why would you send both support worker and social Worker to Scotland to seek information when you can request information and make phone calls
Yours faithfully,
Mrs Parkin

Dear Mrs Parkin,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Social Services
Budget and more which we received on 24/09/2023.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 23/10/2023. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ

Dear Sheffield City Council,
FoI officer
I made FOI  that's long over due , in September 23 and you acknowledged to say its due 23 Oct 23. Its 18 Nov today so LONG over due.
Can I kindly request for a response as you have a legal obligation to respond or send me reasons why you don't want to respond and what action I need to take if you continue to ignore me
Yours faithfully,
Mrs Parkin
